name: Very very long road
description:
I made this game for the #NoticeMe gamejam.

It's two games packed in one. Drive a car in the desert through the day, and kill zombies through the night.

I used two sketchy techniques of fake 3d to make my game, both relies on fake perspective. It has a "unique" style only a mother could love but it's still pretty fun to play.

Controls :
You need a controller to play this game.
     -Left stick to control your car / aim your gun
     -A to shoot
     -B to choose next weapon.
     -X to choose previous weapon.
